English: Welcome to the factory kid. Let's get you started workin' the factory
Don't know which buttons do what? Press ENTER or click the ? in the top right to get an overview.
See that bright shape on your workbench? Recreate those to get paid but don't forget. If you make a mistake it's back to square one.
At the bottom of the screen you'll see possible lines you can place. These will help you build your shapes piece by piece.
Getting shapes right builds your combo! See that meter next to your shape? The higher your combo the more points you'll earn. Keep the streak going!
Want to change things up? Press spacebar to control shape complexity. The arrow shows if shapes will become simpler more complex or stay the same. You're in control!
You've completed the tutorial! Now make [NUM] shapes so we know you're ready!
You're all set! Remember practice makes perfect. The more you play the better you'll get at creating these shapes. Have fun!"
